verbs.description: [ARG1: sabres] [V: come] [ARG4: home] [ARG3: from successful trip to face canadiens] the buffalo sabres hope to maintain the momentum gained from a strong finish to a 3 - 2 - 0 western road trip when they return home to play the montreal canadiens on thursday night nhl ryan miller patrick roy sabres anaheim ducks buffalo sabres claude julien jonathan drouin montreal canadiens flames kyle okposo anaheim california phil housley carey price anaheim los angeles kings jacques plante l a buffalo
